mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_code AS "channelCode", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_key AS "channelKey", a.provider_code AS "providerCode", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.scene_key AS "sceneKey", a.bank_id AS "bankId", a.bank_provider AS "bankProvider", a.sub_merchant_no AS "subMerchantNo"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route_channel_bankid( id, channel_code, channel_name, channel_key, provider_code, pay_type, scene_key, bank_id, bank_provider, sub_merchant_no ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{channelCode}, #{channelName}, #{channelKey}, #{providerCode}, #{payType}, #{sceneKey}, #{bankId}, #{bankProvider}, #{subMerchantNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE route_channel_bankid SET channel_code = #{channelCode}, channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_key = #{channelKey}, provider_code = #{providerCode}, pay_type = #{payType}, scene_key = #{sceneKey}, bank_id = #{bankId}, bank_provider = #{bankProvider}, sub_merchant_no = #{subMerchantNo} WHERE id = #{id}
